title: Create media tracking app with ratings, reviews, and sharing

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store media entries with fields for title, type (movie, TV show, or video game), rating (numerical score), review text, date added, and user owner

quotes: track movies, tv shows and video games watched

acceptanceCriteria: Media entries can be created with all required fields
Type field accepts only movie, TV show, or video game
Rating field accepts numerical values
Review field accepts text input
Each entry is associated with the user who created it

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete media entries for authenticated users

quotes: track movies, tv shows and video games watched

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add new media entries
Users can view their own media entries
Users can edit their existing entries
Users can delete their entries
All operations require user authentication

requirements.text: Create a backend sharing system that allows users to generate shareable links or grant access to their media lists for specific friends
acceptanceCriteria: Users can generate shareable access for their media list
Shared lists are viewable by friends with appropriate permissions
Users can revoke sharing access
Shared lists display the owner's entries in read-only mode

requirements.text: Build a frontend interface to display the user's media list with cards or rows showing title, type, rating, and review excerpt for each entry

quotes: track movies, tv shows and video games watched

acceptanceCriteria: Media entries are displayed in an organized list or grid layout
Each entry shows the title, media type, rating, and review preview
The list is visually distinct for different media types
Empty state is shown when no entries exist

requirements.text: Implement a frontend form to add new media entries with fields for title, type selector (movie/TV show/video game), rating input, and review text area

quotes: track movies, tv shows and video games watched

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes text input for title
Type selector offers movie, TV show, and video game options
Rating input allows users to set a numerical rating
Review text area allows multi-line text entry
Form validates required fields before submission
Successful submission adds entry to the user's list

requirements.text: Create a rating bar component that visually displays the rating value for each media entry (e.g., stars, progress bar, or numerical indicator)
acceptanceCriteria: Rating is displayed as a visual indicator (not just text)
The display clearly communicates the rating value
Rating component is reusable across entry cards and detail views

requirements.text: Build a sharing interface that allows users to generate and copy a shareable link to their media list
acceptanceCriteria: Users can access a sharing option in the UI
A shareable link is generated and displayed
Users can copy the link to clipboard
Shared links allow friends to view the list in read-only mode

requirements.text: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to secure media entries and sharing features
acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in via Internet Identity
Authenticated users can access their personal media list
Unauthenticated users cannot create or modify entries
Authentication state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, cinematic tones (deep burgundy, gold accents, charcoal backgrounds) and elegant typography that evokes entertainment and media consumption
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, entertainment-focused tones consistently throughout the app
Typography is legible and appropriate for content display
UI components follow the established visual language
Layout and spacing create a polished, cohesive experience

constraints: All media entries must be associated with authenticated users
Shared lists must be read-only for viewers
nonGoals: Integration with external movie/game databases or APIs
Social features beyond simple list sharing (likes, comments, followers)
Advanced search or filtering by genre, year, or other metadata

required: Cinematic hero banner with film reel and game controller motifs in warm burgundy and gold tones (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
